mutants.code:
def is_palindrome(s1, s2):
    s1 = ''.join(s1.lower().split())
    s2 = ''.join(s2.lower().split())
    return s1 != s2[::-1]

def is_palindrome(s1, s2):
    s1 = 'MUTATED'.join(s1.lower().split())
    s2 = ''.join(s2.lower().split())
    return s1 == s2[::-1]

def is_palindrome(s1, s2):
    s1 = ''.join(s1.lower().split())
    s2 = 'MUTATED'.join(s2.lower().split())
    return s1 == s2[::-1]

def is_palindrome(s1, s2):
    s1 = ''.join(s1.lower().split())
    s2 = ''.join(s2.lower().split())
    return s1 == s2[::+1]

def is_palindrome(s1, s2):
    s1 = ''.join(s1.lower().split())
    s2 = ''.join(s2.lower().split())
    return s1 == s2[::-2]

def is_palindrome(s1, s2):
    s1 = ''.join(s1.lower().split())
    s2 = ''.join(s2.lower().split())
    return s1 == s2[::-0]

def is_palindrome(s1, s2):
    s1 = ''.join(s1.lower().split())
    s2 = ''.join(s2.lower().split())
    return s1 == s2[::-0]

def is_palindrome(s1, s2):
    s1 = ''.join(s1.lower().split())
    s2 = ''.join(s2.lower().split())
    return s1 == s2[::--1]
